CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1967, pg. 15, reads: "New Club '21' - Introducing the new Club 21, which was recently reorganized. The girls are planning their introductory affair for Saturday, Sept. 23 at the Oliver 212 Restaurant, from 12 until 4 P.M.  First row from left: Jo-Anne Bates, Dolly Wray and Bette Payne.  Second row: Shirley Smith, social chairman; Agnes Robinson and Rosalind Waller.  Back row: Joyce Lewis, Ann Haley and Judy Davenport, president.  Absent members are Mayota HIll, Gladys Holt, Louise Hampton, Ida Johnson, Beverly Herring and Coray Hill. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of New Club 21 members, first row from left: Jo Anne Loftin Bates, Dolly Wray, Bette Payne; second row: Shirley Smith, Agnes Robinson, Rosalind Waller; back row: Joyce Lewis, Ann Sharpe Haley, and Judy Loftin Davenport, posed in Loendi Club
